duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct skills gap analysis and develop learning frameworks to support employee competence.
Design and deliver training tools and resources; develop innovative training sessions and e-learning modules.
Drive collaboration within the customer experience community and with business partners to ensure consistency of learning programs.
Manage internal stakeholders and external suppliers to achieve learning training objectives.
Train, coach, mentor, and develop colleagues across the customer experience community to higher levels of performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Training & Development, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's preferred)
